definition: cartilaginous fishes having horizontally flattened bodies and enlarged winglike pectoral fins with gills on the underside, expose to radiation
details:
noun
- cartilaginous fishes having horizontally flattened bodies and enlarged winglike pectoral fins with gills on the underside
- any of the stiff bony spines in the fin of a fish
- the syllable naming the second (supertonic) note of any major scale in solmization
= synonyms: re
- a column of light (as from a beacon)
= synonyms: irradiation
- a group of nearly parallel lines of electromagnetic radiation
= synonyms: beam, electron beam
- a branch of an umbel or an umbelliform inflorescence
- (mathematics) a straight line extending from a point
verb
- expose to radiation
= synonyms: irradiate
- extend or spread outward from a center or focus or inward towards a center
= synonyms: radiate
- emit as rays
= example: emit as rays
